scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei performing the song 'Fansa' during her 3D graduation stream.
Nanashi Mumei performing 'Guitar, Loneliness and Blue Planet'.

subtitles.original: もっと！
subtitles.english: More!

subtitles.original: 受け止めてね
subtitles.english: Please accept it

subtitles.original: 愛のこもったわがままソング
subtitles.english: A selfish song filled with love

subtitles.original: ファンサしちゃうぞ！
subtitles.english: I'm gonna give you some fanservice!
Haa~...

subtitles.original: 終わりが近づく寂しいな
subtitles.english: The end is near, it's so lonely

subtitles.original: 楽しいのに泣きそうだよ
subtitles.english: I'm having fun but I feel like crying

subtitles.original: 次も、次も、また会えるよね
subtitles.english: Next time, and the next, we'll meet again, right?

subtitles.original: 約束！
subtitles.english: Promise!

subtitles.original: 優しさに溢れている言葉も
subtitles.english: Words overflowing with kindness,

subtitles.original: 心無い誰かの言葉さえも
subtitles.english: and even the heartless words of some stranger,

subtitles.original: 必要なんだ　必要なんだ
subtitles.english: I need them, I need them all

subtitles.original: 強くなろう
subtitles.english: To become stronger

subtitles.original: 好きに叫んで　もっと！
subtitles.english: Shout as you please, more!

subtitles.original: 堪能しちゃって　もっと！
subtitles.english: Enjoy yourself to the fullest, more!

subtitles.original: 忘れないでね　特別な日になりますように
subtitles.english: Don't forget this, may it become a special day

subtitles.original: 共に歌おう　ずっと！
subtitles.english: Let's sing together, forever!

subtitles.original: 共に歩もう　ずっと！
subtitles.english: Let's walk together, forever!

subtitles.original: 合言葉は　とびきりの...
subtitles.english: Our password is a super...

subtitles.original: L・O・V・E！
subtitles.english: L-O-V-E!

subtitles.original: 好きになって　もっと！
subtitles.english: Fall in love with me, more!

subtitles.original: 私を見て　もっと！
subtitles.english: Look at me, more!

subtitles.original: 恩返しは　愛のこもった...
subtitles.english: My way of returning the favor is with a...

subtitles.original: ...投げキッスで！
subtitles.english: ...blowing kiss filled with love!

subtitles.original: 虜にする　もっと！
subtitles.english: I'll captivate you, more!

subtitles.original: 夢を見せる　もっと！
subtitles.english: I'll show you a dream, more!

subtitles.original: 楽しんでって　愛のこもった...
subtitles.english: Have fun, with a...

subtitles.original: ...スペシャルナイト！
subtitles.english: ...special night filled with love!

subtitles.original: ファンサしちゃうぞ！
subtitles.english: I'm gonna give you some fanservice!

subtitles.original:
ギターと孤独と蒼い惑星
Composition: 音羽-otoha- / Lyrics: ZAQ
subtitles.english:
Guitar, Loneliness and Blue Planet
Composition: otoha / Lyrics: ZAQ

subtitles.original: 突然降る夕立　あら　傘もないや　イヤイヤ
subtitles.english: A sudden evening shower, oh, I don't even have an umbrella, no no

subtitles.original: 空のご機嫌なんか伺うの　やめな
subtitles.english: Stop checking on the sky's mood

subtitles.original: 季節の変わり目の風は　今日は何を食やいいんだろう
subtitles.english: The wind at the turn of the seasons, I wonder what I should eat today

subtitles.original: 春と秋どこ行っちゃったんだよ
subtitles.english: Where did spring and autumn go?

subtitles.original: 息もできない　情報の圧力
subtitles.english: I can't even breathe, the pressure of information

subtitles.original: めまいの螺旋だ　私はどこにいる
subtitles.english: A spiral of dizziness, where am I?

subtitles.original: こんなに　こんなに　息の音がするのに
subtitles.english: Even though I can hear the sound of my breath so clearly

subtitles.original: 変だね　世界の音がしない
subtitles.english: It's strange, I can't hear the world's sound

subtitles.original: 足りない　足りない　誰にも気づかれない
subtitles.english: Not enough, not enough, noticed by no one

subtitles.original: 殴り書きみたいな音　出せない状態で叫んだよ
subtitles.english: I screamed in a state where I couldn't make a sound like a scribble

subtitles.original: ありのままなんて　誰に見せるんだ
subtitles.english: Who am I supposed to show my true self to?

subtitles.original: 馬鹿な私は歌うだけ　ぶちまけちゃおうか　星に
subtitles.english: Stupid me, I just sing, shall I spill it all out to the stars?

subtitles.original: エリクサーに張り替える作業も　何となくなんだ
subtitles.english: Even the task of restring with Elixir is just kind of whatever

subtitles.original: 欠けた爪を少し触る
subtitles.english: I touch my chipped nail a bit

subtitles.original: 半径300mmの体で　必死に鳴いてる
subtitles.english: With a body with a 300mm radius, I'm crying out desperately

subtitles.original: 音楽にとっちゃ　此処が地球だな
subtitles.english: For music, this must be the Earth

subtitles.original: 空気を吸い込んで　空を殴るよ
subtitles.english: I inhale the air and punch the sky

subtitles.original: 何にもできない　私は無力さ
subtitles.english: I can't do anything, I'm powerless

subtitles.original: だけどさ　その手で　この鉄を弾いたら
subtitles.english: But you know, if I pluck these steel strings with those hands,

subtitles.original: 何かが変わって見えた
subtitles.english: something seemed to change

subtitles.original: 眩しい　眩しい　そんなに光るなよ
subtitles.english: Dazzling, dazzling, don't shine so brightly

subtitles.original: 私のダサさが　より濃くなってしまうだろう
subtitles.english: It'll just make my uncoolness stand out even more

subtitles.original: 何でこんなに熱くなっちゃってんだ　止まらない
subtitles.english: Why am I getting so fired up? I can't stop

subtitles.original: 馬鹿な私は歌うだけ
subtitles.english: Stupid me, I just sing

subtitles.original: うるさいんだって　心臓
subtitles.english: Shut up already, my heart

subtitles.original: 蒼い惑星　ひとりぼっちがいっぱいの
subtitles.english: A blue planet, full of lonely people

subtitles.original: 音を聞いてきた
subtitles.english: I've been listening to the sounds

subtitles.original: 回り続けて　億年　一瞬でも
subtitles.english: Continuing to spin for billions of years, even for an instant...
